components.name: 1-butyl-3-pentylimidazolium bis((trifluoromethyl)sulfonyl)imide

ref.full: Rotrekl, J.; Storch, J.; Velisek, P.; Schroer, W.; Jacquemin, J.; Wagner, Z.; Husson, P.; Bendova, M. (2017) J. Solution Chem. 46(7), 1456-1474.
ref.title: Liquid Phase Behavior in Systems of 1-Butyl-3-alkylimidazolium bis{(trifluoromethyl)sulfonyl}imide Ionic Liquids with Water: Influence of the Structure of the C5 Alkyl Substituent
